text: Arthur Robert MacKenzie (June 26, 1873 – February 10, 1963) was a Canadian politician. He served in the Legislative Assembly of New Brunswick as member of the Conservative party representing St. Stephen-Milltown from 1926 to 1930. ==References== Category:20th-century Canadian politicians Category:1873 births Category:1963 deaths Category:Progressive Conservative Party of New Brunswick MLAs
title: Arthur R. MacKenzie
